jobDescription: ENGINE SHOP IS NOT YOUR TYPICAL AGENCY. We are looking for great people who are passionate about what they do. People who understand the value of hard work, are willing to get their hands dirty and enjoy the process as much as the result. People who love working on a team. People with a make it happen and get it done attitude. People who, no matter what the level, are leaders. No two gears are the same but they all fit together to make an unstoppable machine here at Engine Shop. Our people are why Engine Shop has been consistently named a "Best Place To Work" by Ad Age and Event Marketer.WHAT’S OUR STORY We are an engagement marketing agency with deep roots across sports, entertainment and lifestyle. We integrate live experiences, digital engagement and content to help our clients connect with their consumers. To best serve our clients, all roles come with the expectation of meeting Engine Shop’s standard of excellence.  But that’s not our only focus. Our culture is a part of everything we do – from our casual work environments to our creative benefits and our acclaimed annual retreat. It’s a part of how we treat one another, how we have each other’s backs and how we welcome people who are different.  We are looking for a Financial Analyst who has strong financial modeling skills, analytical skills and communication skills. Someone who continuously seeks optimum performance by acting with tenacity and looks to achieves objectives set within a defined timeframe. A Financial Analyst who can identify and present key information and who gives his/her point of view by structuring and summing up all useful elements.
